criteria: Reading Comprehension: Ability to understand explicit and implicit meanings within the text.
Textual Analysis: Skill in interpreting and analyzing literary devices, figurative language, and structural elements.
Vocabulary and Language Use: Command of vocabulary and ability to understand and use language appropriate for the text's complexity.
Independent Reading: Ability to read and comprehend texts independently and proficiently within the grade level's complexity band.
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of the text; unable to identify basic plot points or character information.
Struggles to understand the text; misinterprets key plot points and character motivations.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of the text; identifies some plot points and character information, but misses nuances.
Comprehends the main ideas of the text; accurately identifies plot points, characters, and themes.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of the text; analyzes plot points, characters, and themes with supporting evidence.
Exhibits a deep and insightful understanding of the text; analyzes complex themes, literary devices, and character development with sophisticated reasoning.
Unable to identify any literary devices or figurative language in the text.
Identifies a few literary devices or figurative language, but struggles to explain their purpose or effect.
Identifies some literary devices and figurative language, but provides superficial analysis.
Analyzes literary devices and figurative language with a basic understanding of their effect on the text.
Analyzes literary devices and figurative language with a clear understanding of their effect on the text; provides relevant examples.
Demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of literary devices and figurative language; provides insightful analysis of their complex effects on the text.
Demonstrates limited vocabulary; struggles to understand the language used in the text.
Misunderstands many vocabulary words; has difficulty comprehending complex sentences.
Understands basic vocabulary; may struggle with more complex or nuanced language.
Demonstrates a good command of vocabulary; comprehends complex sentences and nuanced language.
Demonstrates a strong command of vocabulary; accurately interprets nuanced language and understands complex sentences.
Exhibits a sophisticated command of vocabulary and language; demonstrates a nuanced understanding of complex sentence structures and literary language.
Unable to read the text independently; requires significant assistance to understand basic meaning.
Reads the text with difficulty; requires frequent assistance to understand key plot points and character information.
Reads the text with some difficulty; occasionally requires assistance to clarify meaning.
Reads the text independently with a general understanding of the content.
Reads the text independently and comprehends the content proficiently.
Reads the text independently, comprehends the content proficiently, and engages with the text critically and thoughtfully.
